paper_abstract: Simon's congruence, denoted by similar to(n), relates words having the same subwords of length up to n. We show that, over a k-letter alphabet, the number of words modulo similar to(n) is in 2(Theta)(n(k-1) log n). (C) 2014 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: On the index of Simon's congruence for piecewise testability
